Publication Title: Immunomodulatory and pro-oncologic effects of ketamine and isoflurane anesthetics in a murine model
Publication Authors: Dominique Abrahams, Arig Ibrahim-Hashim, Robert S Ackerman, Joel S Brown, Christopher J Whelan, Megan B Garfinkel, Robert A Gatenby, Aaron R Muncey
Publication Abstract: Introduction: Volatile and intravenous anesthetics may worsen oncologic outcomes in basic science animal models. These effects may be related to suppressed innate and adaptive immunity, decreased immunosurveillance, and disrupted cellular signaling.
